attributes.action: stop the use of free travel passes of under 18s in london after 6pm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we would like to stop the use of free travel passes to the under 18's after 6pm. last night at 11pm I was on a bus packed with 16 to 18 year olds.

Most of these people were heading out all dressed up to go drinking, when asked by the driver to show a pass they said we 14. If these people were just 14 why were the going out drinking and claiming to be 18 to get a drink.

If they are claiming to be 18 then they should be paying a full fair on the bus.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
